testimonial1.text: Fenix AI has transformed our operations completely. We've seen a 40% increase in efficiency and significant cost reductions.
testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.text: The AI automation solutions provided by Fenix have streamlined our processes and improved our decision-making capabilities.
testimonial2.name: Michael Chen

testimonial3.text: Outstanding results! Our productivity has increased by 35% since implementing Fenix AI solutions.
testimonial3.name: Emily Rodriguez

assistant.title: Your AI Assistant is Ready
assistant.subtitle: Get instant answers about our AI solutions
assistant.placeholder: Ask me anything about Fenix AI...

responses.greeting: Hello! I'm your Fenix AI assistant. How can I help you today?
responses.services: We offer AI automation solutions for healthcare, finance, manufacturing, retail, logistics, and education. Which industry interests you?
responses.pricing: Our pricing is customized based on your specific needs. Would you like to schedule a consultation to discuss your requirements?
responses.demo: I'd be happy to arrange a demo for you! Please contact us through WhatsApp or email to schedule a personalized demonstration.
responses.integration: Our AI solutions integrate seamlessly with existing systems. We provide full support during implementation and beyond.
responses.default: That's a great question! For detailed information, I recommend contacting our team directly through WhatsApp or email.

footer.description: Fenix AI is a leading provider of artificial intelligence solutions for business automation. We help companies across industries optimize their operations, reduce costs, and accelerate growth through cutting-edge AI technology.
